ID: text = Devānampiyo Piyadasi r[ā]jā evam āha
text = / sarvata vijite mama yutā ca rājūke ca prādesike ca paṃcasu paṃcasu vāsesu anusaṃ/y[ā]na[ṃ n]iyātu etāyeva athāya imāya dhaṃmānusastiya yathā añā/ya pi kaṃmāy[a]
text = [s]ādhu matari ca pitari ca susrūsā mitra-saṃstuta-ñātīnaṃ bāmhaṇa-/samaṇānaṃ sādh[u d]ānaṃ prāṇānaṃ sādhu anārambho apavyayatā apabhāḍatā sādhu
text = / parisa pi yute āñapayisati gaṇanāyaṃ hetuto ca vyaṃjanato ca
